name: MAKE A SCENE v OVERDRIVE | NEW YEARS EVE PARTY - TICKETS
description:
MAKE A SCENE v OVERDRIVE | ONE MASSIVE NYE PARTY! 
ROCK | PUNK | METAL | MOSH | GLAM | & MORE |9PM-4AM
THE CROWN | LINTHORPE ROAD | MIDDLESBROUGH | 18+

All your favourite alternative anthems mixed with the best songs of 2013 and bands who've played MAS shows! 

FREE ENTRY FOR ANY MEMBER OF ANY BAND WHOM PLAYED A MAKE A SCENE SHOW IN THE LAST 12 MONTHS! 
(Email your guest list to a.knights@makeasceneuk.com) 
Lists must be band members and must arrive before 11

**DOOR TAX**
£3 ADVANCED TICKETS // £5 ON THE DOOR
(This will be extremely popular so we advise buying tickets)

**WHAT TO EXPECT?**
WIN - Make a Scene 2014 tickets! 
WIN - Scorpion Vodka! 
WIN - Bottles of Bubbly! 
FREE - MAS T-Shirts!
FREE - Pizza! 
FREE - Party snacks!
MORE - Bars & staff!
MANY - DJ's taking shifts and partying with you!   
PLAY - Retro Games!
NO - Chavs or scumbags! 
& SURPRISES - Because we love em'

DRINKS FROM £1.99 // SHOTS FROM ONLY £1
